title: SR2的碎石杵无法连锁
author: LnsRhi
txt_content:
如题，SR2的碎石杵无法用VeinMiner连锁
以下是VeinMiner的部分配置文件
overrides {
    # Mine all blocks with all registered tools that can harvest blocks.
    B:override.allBlocks=true

    # Allow all tools, including the open hand, to be used to mine blocks.
    B:override.allTools=true
}复制代码

replies.author: LnsRhi
replies.txt_content:
youyihj 发表于 2020-7-13 23:00
换OreExcavation
谢谢大佬，明天我试试看
